featured.text: They crowd the classrooms at Bekoji Elementary School, where Eshetu works as a physical-education instructor.

definition.zh_def: 指導者或教師，負責教授或訓練學生的專業人士。
definition.en_def: A person who teaches or trains others, especially in a formal educational setting.
definition.example: The instructor explained the complex topic clearly to the students.
